A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
When i heard the reasons people give to hate the movie i was surprised.
In the original trilogy there were things that weren't good and that's normal.
The Kylo Ren scene = Slave Leia
The Snoke death = Palpatine death
The film being about a ship chase = A Death star that can be destroyed by one shot 
There are flaws like in every movie but that doesn't mean it isn't good.If you want to hate something you'll always find a something that you can't agree with.
